ca.encodeous.pong.system

Interface GameSystemEvents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PongWindow

    public interface GameSystemEvents
    An interface that enables any number of clients or shims to hook into the GameSystem to listen for game events Possible TODO: Extract pong-specific events into a separate abstract class that implements this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Called after updating the last object

      Called when an object is removed

      Called when a player has scored a point

      Called when the object has been updated during a tick

      Called when a player has won the game
